name: Tillandsia
description: Produces oxygen at night, improving air quality.

name: Xerographica
description: Known for its large rosette shape and drought resistance.

name: Ionantha
description: Compact and colorful, turns red when about to bloom.

name: Caput Medusae
description: d after Medusa due to its wild, curling leaves.

name: Bulbosa
description: Unique bulbous base and thin, curving leaves.

name: Stricta
description: Easy to care for, blooms with bright pink flowers.

name: Fasciculata
description: Sturdy and reliable air plant with bright blooms.

name: Tectorum
description: Covered in fuzzy trichomes, giving it a silvery look.

name: Juncea
description: Tall, grassy look with thin leaves and easy care.

name: Abdita
description: Beautiful rosette shape, can turn red in bright light.
